Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.snippets.bottom.file
Parameter.description: File URL for bottom snippets content (below body tag) e.g. file:///my/vlo/snippets/bottom.html

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.enabled
Parameter.description: Set to true to enable user satisfaction rating collection

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.panel.showPanelDelay
Parameter.description: minimal time (seconds) to wait between session start and first appearance of panel

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.panel.dismissTimeout
Parameter.description: minimal time (seconds) between dismissing the panel and showing it again

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.panel.submitTimeout
Parameter.description: minimal time (seconds) between submitting the panel and showing it again

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.service
Parameter.description: Name of the service to store along with the ratings

Parameter.name: eu.clarin.cmdi.vlo.rating.couchdb.user
Parameter.description: CouchDB user name (leave empty for no auth)
